name: And So, I Fall
description:
Masami has always been one of the good kids: he got good grades, was good at his extracurriculars, and had good relations with just about everyone. The type that always came to class, sat in the front row, and turned his homework in on time. Never once had he broken the rules.

So, when he is suspended for vandalizing school grounds right before winter break, it has to be a mistake. Good kids like him aren’t supposed to snap out of nowhere. Right?

A submission for the 2021 Winter VN Jam (thanks to Katy133, Nai and DevTalk for hosting )! Updated version (including voice acting) coming soon. :)

Features
  • ~20k word kinetic novel (~2 hours of gameplay)
  • Phone messages
  • Point and click scenes
  • 7 sprited characters
  • 7+ CGs and 13+ BGs
Content Warnings

Occasional strong language. Instance of underage drinking. Mentions of suicide, depression.
